name: ninja
description: Graffino Ninja. Website building webpack flow we use at Graffino.

scripts.[Ninja] => Resonable Defaults: Reasonable defaults: dev, static and wp for quick access.
scripts.webpack:dev:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running static development build... 
'; webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js --env.NODE_ENV=development
scripts.webpack:build:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running static production build... 
'; webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.webpack:wp:dev:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running WordPress development build... 
'; webpack --progress --watch --config webpack.wordpress.js
scripts.webpack:wp:build:
echo '
[Ninja] => Running WordPress production build... 
'; webpack --config webpack.wordpress.prod.js
scripts.[Ninja] => Wordpress Management: Wordpress management scripts for dev, build, setup, database scripts, file syncing, etc. Remote syncing *requires* rsync (brew install rsync).
scripts.wp:build: yarn node:install; yarn composer:install; yarn wp:sync:uploads --no-confirm; yarn webpack:wp:build
scripts.wp:setup:
echo '
[Ninja] => Installing WordPress... 
'; yarn node:install; yarn composer:install; yarn wp:db:init --no-confirm; yarn wp:sync:uploads --no-confirm
scripts.wp:update:
echo '
[Ninja] => Updating WordPress... 
'; yarn composer:update; yarn wp:sync:uploads --no-confirm
scripts.[Ninja] => Utilities: Utilities for cleaning all temporary files, bumping version using semver.
scripts.composer:install:
echo '
[Ninja] => Installing composer modules... 
'; composer install; yarn wp:clean --no-confirm
scripts.composer:update:
echo '
[Ninja] => Updating composer modules... 
'; composer update; yarn wp:clean --no-confirm
scripts.[Ninja] Git Scripts: Several more comple git scripts used in deployment.
scripts.git:pull-merge-push:
echo '
[Ninja] => Commiting changes...
'; git add -A; git commit -m '[Ninja] Automatic deploy merge'; git pull -s recursive -X theirs --no-edit; echo '
[Ninja] => Pushing changes...
'; git push
scripts.test:regression: yarn cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/regression/**/*.spec.js"  --reporter cypress-image-snapshot/reporter --env failOnSnapshotDiff=false --browser chrome
scripts.test:regression:approve: docker run -it -v $PWD:/e2e -w /e2e -e CYPRESS_baseUrl=http://host.docker.internal:3000 -e CYPRESS_updateSnapshots=true cypress/included:4.0.2 run --browser chrome
scripts.[Ninja] => Code QA: Linting and code standards prettifiers for JS and SCSS.
scripts.lint:js:
echo '
[Ninja] => Start linting JS...
'; eslint src -c .eslintrc --ext js
scripts.lint: yarn lint:js; yarn lint:scss; yarn lint:php
scripts.fix: yarn fix:js; yarn fix:scss; yarn fix:php
scripts.deploy:build:
echo '
[Ninja] => Start static deploy... 
'; yarn git:pull-merge-push; yarn node:install; yarn webpack:build
scripts.deploy:wp:
echo '
[Ninja] => Start WordPress deploy... 
'; yarn wp:db:dump --no-confirm; yarn wp:sync:uploads --no-confirm; yarn git:pull-merge-push; yarn wp:build
scripts.deploy:wp:nodump:
echo '
[Ninja] => Start WordPress deploy... 
'; yarn wp:sync:uploads --no-confirm; yarn git:pull-merge-push; yarn wp:build
